pageContext.claim: “Before my election, our leaders used the great American middle class as a piggy bank to fund their delusional global projects. It's all over the globe. Remember this, I'm President of the United States, I'm not President of the world. They decimated American manufacturing to promote economic growth in foreign countries.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's rhetoric smears previous presidents, all of whom sought to increase trade with other countries in order to boost the U.S. economy.
